text: Red Sorghum is a 1987 Chinese romantic drama movie directed by Zhang Yimou and was based on the 1986 novel by Mo Yan. It stars Gong Li, Jiang Wen, Ji Chunhua, Teng Rujun. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1987 romantic drama movies Category:Chinese movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Zhang Yimou
title: Red Sorghum
